author: game.changer.wallet
title: GameChanger: Ledger HW support
description: Our feature rich, Cardano unleasher wallet is not yet compatible with Ledger or Trezor HW wallets. This affects user onboarding and trust.
solution: We will research and build Trezor and Ledger support to enhance our rich feature set with extra security, for users and dapp builders.
experience: We made GameChanger, a released and long term product, highly humanized and gamified wallet, committed to newcomers, students and builders.
